channel.title: Weird source error
channel.description:
i was playing around with NPC's(mainly on NPChandler) for an hour and can't really remember other files i edited but then i compiled(worked fine) and clicked run source, it comes up with this :c
Deathlypvpz Starting, do not close! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "fÇ0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:5375) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:70) at server.Server.(Server.java:72) Press any key to continue . . .
can anybody help? :P i'm sure it's nothing to do with NPCHandler, as i backed up and used backup copy and still has problem.

item.title: Weird source error
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

The error doesn’t have to do with the Batch file you’re initiating the Server with. Are you sure your File you backed up doesn’t have this problem as well? Try running a search for the exception and Debug this. Check the actions as well while you’re at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird source error
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

try with this:

@echo off title Deathlypvpz Source, Running color 70 echo Deathlypvpz Starting, do not close! "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin/java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Weird source error
item.dc:creator: @Projectdestruction Projectdestruction
item.description:
@Projectdestruction wrote:

[QUOTE]@echo off
title Deathlypvpz Source, Running
color 70
echo Deathlypvpz Starting, do not close!
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin/java.exe” -Xmx1300m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause[/QUOTE]

item.title: Weird source error
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

right click run.bat and copy the code you have into it and paste it here as reply ill see if i can help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird source error
item.dc:creator: @Projectdestruction Projectdestruction
item.description:
@Projectdestruction wrote:

i was playing around with NPC’s(mainly on NPChandler) for an hour and can’t really remember other files i edited but then i compiled(worked fine) and clicked run source, it comes up with this :c

Deathlypvpz Starting, do not close!
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “fÇ0”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:65)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527)
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:5375)
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:70)
at server.Server.(Server.java:72)
Press any key to continue . . .

can anybody help? i’m sure it’s nothing to do with NPCHandler, as i backed up and used backup copy and still has problem.

Read full topic
